I'm here until after lunch; then I go to Montague for the afternoon/early evening. Since I'm the Provincial Coordinator for the Young Millionaires Program, today I'm going to sit in on the workshops being conducted on the eastern end of the Island. What is the Young Millionaires Program you might ask? It's basically my main duty of the summer. I'm the Provincial Coordinator as well as the western queens/eastern prince facilitator. It's a program designed to assist youth between the ages of 8 to 16 years old discover more about business by teaching them basic business skills and by helping them start their own business for the months of July and August. The participants attend a series of workshops that cover basic business skills like marketing and record keeping. When they finish the workshops they submit a business plan for the opportunity to receive up to $100 (non-repayable grant) to start their business. I think the program is going to make for a real fun summer for me. Once the workshops are complete, I spend the rest of the summer visiting all the different businesses and setting up opportunities for them to sell their product or market their service. For instance, we'll set up at the Lobster Carnival Sidewalk Sale and things like that. I'm thinking of actually making a Young Millionaires blog as another method of communication with the participants. That way I can also post pictures that I take during the summer, etc. Anywho, I best get to work!!! Take care

I was just going through old papers and found the results from my Myers-Briggs Personality Test that I ddi earlier in the year. Myers-Briggs is probably the most used personality type indicator test. Anywho, I am an ISFJ...I went on the web and found a description... **************************************************************** You are sympathetic, loyal, considerate, and conscientious. You will go to any amount of trouble, when it makes sense to you, to help those in need. You are responsible and enjoy being needed. You are down-to-earth and realistic and like others who are quiet and unassuming. You absorb and enjoy using a large number of facts. You like situations where the rules are well defined and where traditions are to be upheld. You focus on providing practical help and services for others and for the organizations you serve. You have a strong work ethic. You can be painstakingly accurate and systematic in handling tasks...you're conservative with traditional values...quiet and modest...tactful and supportive of friends and family... You are often self-effacing in getting the job done, and are willing to make necessary sacrifices, especially for your family. You are at your best quietly providing assistance and making sure things are in order. You have a few close friends, don't like disharmony, and try to keep cooperation at all costs...you'll stay close friends with that tight circle for a LONG time...worry a lot... You need to have things organized in a way you think works.. you cannot work when things are out of order...when things are in disarray, you have to reorganize 'em immediately....you get involved with leisure ONLY after all the work is done... You have a tendency to put off relaxing because there's too much work to be done...you enjoy time with your family...you fall in love hard when you fall. You place a high value on marriage and family...you seek out a partner and feel unfulfilled without one. you most likely are a good student because you diligently follow through in your work to please your teachers.....you learn best by DOING... You tend not to be the center of attention...often appear serious...others like trying to get a laugh or a smile out of you...you get angry or bitter when scorned...but you keep it inside... Possible blindspots: because you are SOOOO in the present, you have a hard time seeing possibilities or consequences of your actions...can become mired in the daily grind...don't forget to express your bottled-up feelings...you can be taken advantage of....could be pessimistic about the future because it's unknown and you rely on past experiences.....you want to plan too much. ISFJ: "I Serve Family Joyfully" **************************************************************** What do you think? Sound like me?
